sentences.english: Xue Li Tun goods" is a unique new school motto."
sentences.chinese: “敦品励学”是学校新颖独特的校训。

sentences.english: Motto is be tolerant to diversity, to take the line away.
sentences.chinese: 校训是海纳百川，取则行远。

sentences.english: Companies should learn from these school mottos.
sentences.chinese: 公司应该向这些校训取经。

sentences.english: School mottoes are the keys to interpreting normal educational beliefs and traditions.
sentences.chinese: 校训是解读师范办学理念与传统的钥匙。

sentences.english: What is the motto of your university?

definition: to carry out (obligation) conscientiously/to behave sincerely
the tone of a school/campus atmosphere
vigorously pursuing knowledge, while scrupulously abiding by the rules of decorum (idiom)
diligent and sociable (idiom); meticulous in work and dealing cheerfully with one's colleagues
style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
with great virtue one can take charge of the world (idiom)
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
